Detailed Description

TransportKeyData Parameter for an Application Master or Link Key. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.15, page 454.

Definition at line 107 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_ReqApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::partnerAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that was also sent this master key.

Definition at line 111 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

bool APS_ReqApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::initiator

This parameter indicates if the destination device of this master key requested it:

  • TRUE = If the destination requested the key,
  • FALSE = Otherwise.

Definition at line 116 of file apsmeTransportKey.h.

uint8_t APS_ReqApplicationMasterOrLinkKeyTransportData_t::key[SECURITY_KEY_SIZE]

The master or link key (as indicated by the KeyType parameter).
